charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(b)(1)(A)(i) and 841(b)(1)(B)(ii)(II); 18:3551 et seq.-Conspiracy to distribute and possess with intent to distribute heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug controlled substance, and cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic drug controlled substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The deft is hereby placed on Probation for a term of 5 years. Remaining count is dismissed on motion of AUSA. The deft shall pay a special assessment of $100.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(ii)(II); 18:3551 et seq.-Distribution and possession with intent to distribute cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic drug controlled substance. (2)
21 USC 841 and 846-Dft did knowingly and intentionally conpsire to distribute cocaine and heroin. [1:96-m-1719]
